info.title: Form Auto Suggest
info.description: Displays a popup with suggestions upon input value. It allows to be connected with modules and applications.

method.name: engage
method.description: Adds a autosuggest controller to the given element.

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The element where the controller will be attached.

parameter.name: $path
parameter.description: The action script where the suggestions will come from.

method.name: engageModule
method.description:
Engage the auto suggest engine to a module.
NOTE: This doesn't work when on secure mode!

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The element where the controller will be attached.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The module view name to load. Leave empty for the module default view. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: An array of attributes to pass to the module view. It is empty array by default.

method.name: engageApp
method.description: Engage the auto suggest engine to the current application.

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The element where the controller will be attached.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The application view name to load.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: An array of attributes to pass to the application view. It is empty array by default.

method.name: getReport
method.description: Get a specific report for the autosuggest control.
